item.title: The Wrong Way to Use Javascript
item.description: I’ve been taking a bit of a coding vacation. Before I jump back into things, I decided to do a little housekeeping and clean the cobwebs from my interwebs. Specifically, reducing the level of annoying coming out of Facebook. Look at this nonsense right here: Wow, what a great user experience! Having to un-check 60-odd check-boxes individually is just great. I’m sure the team of 15 out of 1,000 Facebook engineers that built this page thought this was really clever.
